page.title: 09A Day in the Life of Peter.
page.content: I usually get up at about 7 o'clock.I have a breakfast of Bran Flakes and clean my teeth with S.R.toothpaste. I have asthma so then I take my medicines.When I am ready for school I go in my dad's Nissan Silvia car. School usually begins with maths or english.We have assembly and playtime and then perhaps recorders or P.E. I have school dinner and then play spot_ball with my friends until in time.In the afternoon we do art, games, topic work and have a story. At 3.20 we go home, I switch on the television until tea_time.After tea I may play outside.I usually play policemen with Rosanna and my brothers.I help my dad with the donkeys and then have a bath ready for bed.Dad reads me a story.I like the one called 'He's Not Human'.I go to sleep at about 7.30 as I am only 8.
